Repeater with purification
==========================

This example contains multiple quantum network protocols (:py:class:`~netsquid.protocols.protocol.Protocol`).
The protocols build on each other: :py:mod:`~netsquid.examples.purify` depends on :py:mod:`~netsquid.examples.entanglenodes`,
while :py:mod:`~netsquid.examples.repeater` depends on both.

Entangle nodes protocol
-----------------------

.. automodule:: netsquid.examples.entanglenodes
   :noindex:

Purification protocols
----------------------

.. automodule:: netsquid.examples.purify
   :noindex:

Repeater protocol
-----------------

.. automodule:: netsquid.examples.repeater
   :noindex:
